features.html: The function f is differentiable for all real numbers. The point  ( 3 , 1 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AF0@ is on the graph of y = f(x), and the slope at each point (x, y) on the graph is given by  d y d x = y 2 ( 6 âˆ’ 2 x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4253@ .
